reviews.text:
I love that everything was perfectly wild. On
The service was well kept yeah, I liked everything.And I'll just keep coming back and back
Hopefully it will stay nice and clean. Management stay on top to make sure it's maintained.
Gregory was my server‚Äîvery patient and friendly. The food was good, and the place was clean. I‚Äôd recommend!

I came in for breakfast this morning. Gregory seared me and took my order. He was attentive, friendly and very efficient. I‚Äôve rarely had such good service in a chain restaurant. I listened to his friendly attitude to the customers surrounding me and knew I had to let the management (and other potential customers) know how far above and beyond the norm his service was. I was thoroughly impressed.
Always super fast and friendly service here! Love coming here with my siblings and our server Curtis was amazing and super nice!
Very nice and clean, food was great and staff was great!

I got here around 8:30pm, got the coffee cake pancakes and let me tell you those pancakes are fire. I mean they probably have enough sugar to run a small country but God are they good.  Keep in mind I do not like pancakes. I dont eat them often.  But I really liked these.

Staff was courteous and attentive.  Location was super clean and staff was actively cleaning.

Things to keep in mind, this review is based on a night where it was raining and slow so I cannot attest to how service is during peak times but off peak service is great.  I will be coming back.

My experience at your new location was deeply unsatisfactory, particularly regarding hygiene. The restaurant was generally dirty, but the condition of the high chair was appalling‚Äîit was a greasy, unkempt mess. The floors were dirty as well. Compounding this, the food was poor: my meal was cold, and the French toast tasted microwaved. My child's pancake also lacked the expected smiley face because the staff didn't bother to ask for my preference during the order. Given these significant issues, I won't be coming back..
Food was amazing. And service was top notch. Would definitely recommend
NEW LOCATION!!! VERY CLEAN AND THE STAFF WAS VERY NICE AND HELPFUL DOWN TO THE HOST BRYANNA AND MY SERVER JANNA .. HER ICE COFFEE IS AMAZING!!! üòù‚ù§Ô∏è 10/10
Beautiful restaurant, very clean and lively. The workers are also very nice and respectful, great atmosphere! Definitely my new go to place
love the staff Richard is always soooo polite and makes us feel comfortable dining in love this new location!‚ù§Ô∏è
this ihop is great . friendly staff Clean environment the food is always hot and delicious . most definitely a great place to come and eat with your loved ones :) .
Muy recomendado buen servicio muy amables muy buena comida ‚ò∫Ô∏è
The Ihop In Fordham Plaza is so nice and beautiful the food is amazing the servers are great My family loves it here

This place is really pleasant ,nice and clean.
The server are patients .
I will really come back again with my family
Great food and friendly staff. I particularly enjoyed the chicken biscuit sandwhich

Really nice and clean place. All staff greeted us and did very well customer service. Will like to give my server Omayra all five stars as she was very patient and gave good recommendations. Food was delicious as expected. Will definitely be visiting again!
Very placent place and clean good thing to have a ihop at Fordham
The customer service good one the service are wonderful and the food is great
The food was really good; the space was very clean, and the staff was amazing!

Comida exquisita
Buen servicio
Parqueadero frente a la calle
Excelente servicio muy buena actitud por los trabajadores excelente servicio la se√±ora omayra
Servicio excelente comida sabrosa buen ambiente
Excellence and amazing service food on point
Loved my service here, Genesis was my server, she was quick, attentive, and efficient. I recommend to come over to this ihop, the staff plus management were super!
This ihop is marvelous and never seen a place with so much positivity and care for their customers.
Everything here is amazing. The staff are all welcoming and they made me feel at home! The food was good. That sever Melani is great!!

The service was Amazing 1st of all!
2nd of all, I was there to celebrate my 40th Birthday!

I have to say for me the food was really good, the servers were nice and attentive, and the place was clean. The manager greeted at the door very politely. I will definitely be going back. The only complaint is that guy who takes the plates was hovering to take the dishes he almost took our cups even with them still having soda. He was a sweet guy just needs to chill, but I get it he is eager to do his job. No harm done.
This is the best IHOP in all of NYC!! You have to go here and the service is impeccable

Best ihop i‚Äôve been too so far the staff there are amazing food was well prepared everyone greeted me so kindly i give this restaurant a 100/10 they also have the best pancakes in the world so many flavors too choose from!!
My experience here today was really great, down from being seated and greeted by Breyana i felt welcomed. My server Frankie was great, he was fast and my food was good! Shout out to them!
The food is given 10/10,the flavor of the meal are so delicious and the service is great you get ur food on time with friendly atmosphere

The food is really good üëçüèΩ and the service is excellent. I recommend it to all that‚Äôs looking for
A great experience dining out along or with friends and family. Thanks for the service provided.

Hi, Melani was a good service,, very attentive. I would definitely recommend trying out this place, the food was excellent, tasted fresh and hot and the atmosphere was perfect, dimly light during the night time.
This was excellent service. Melani was the best waitress. The food was fantastic.
My waiter Brook was very nice towards me and my son and very respectful and helpful gave us everything we needed no complaints
Melani was an exceptional waiter since I‚Äôve been coming here she‚Äôs the best by far, she deserves a raise and a new position as assistant manager

The same reason why I stopped going to the ihop at Allerton, and I just happened here. My first visit with my kids and the host decided to skip the waiting list . When I approached about it. Very sazzy and arrogant answer "no reason I was going to get to you eventually "
For sure im not coming back
Recommend this places, breakfast was perfect, very good food and fresh, the services was very friendly
I did takeout. The food was great and staff very polite.

So , I went here to inquire about pick up . No one was at the desk ! I ringing the bell no one comes . I go inside they say sorry it‚Äôs not loud enough! It‚Äôs a bunch of servers sitting around and on the phone ! THIS IS A HORRIBLE LOCATION! I won‚Äôt eat from here if it the last thing on earth !
Horrible. My entire order was wrong. Never going back
New restaurant good service only bathroom is to small for a big restaurant

Terrible service, we sat for a while and no one came to ask for our order, the waiters are only on one side without worrying about the customers, when we got up to leave there, no one bothered to ask if there was any problem. It is definitely not recommended.
Nice, new, spacious, not too packed. Friendly and reliable service. Great addition to this place I call home
I came for gluten free pancakes and ihop doesn‚Äôt serve them anymore üò¢so I just sat and watch my family eat üòî
Excellent service !!!! The staff is very friendly and helpful and the place is very clean 100/100

Hello, i went today for the first time because i love pancakes.!!!!! Atmosphere was alright, hostees looked nervous to take a order,  i ordered a set of pancakes with bacon, and scrambled eggs and hashbrows. As soon as i received the plate ; something smelled weird. The hasbrowns were alot of amount and was not  properly cooked from the inside but burned on top. if you come here; dont get hashbrowns!! Other than that coffee was great. But NJ Ihop way better than this one.

This ihop is really nice ! The service was spectacular would come again , food was fantastic I didn't even get pics bc we ate it so fast lol. Ignore the bad reviews they don't know what they are talking about !
Ordered takeout the other day.  Service and food was fine.

Terrible service!!! The food was cold and the sandwich bread was all burnt. The food tasted and looked reheated and did not taste fresh at all. The amount of fries were a  miserable amount. Absolutely saddening. The waiters take forever to give the meal and the seating logistics make no sense at all. If I could give a zero, I would give the place a negative infinity review. Awful place üëéüëéüëéüëé
Nice to see an iHOP on Fordham Plaza. Good service and food. Pretty quiet on Saturday afternoons and the place is clean ! No complaints on my end, will definitely visit again soon !
The breakfast combo was amazing, and the cheese cake pancakes were so soft and not too sweet. Wonderfully experience!!!

I came here a few days ago for breakfast of course. The place was so clean and the staff was so friendly. I‚Äôd like to point out a girl in particular her name is Tessa I really loved her service! She was very sweet and kind and definitely made me feel welcome. 10/10 would come back!

I was planning on eating here, but after seeing the restaurant owner allow ICE to enter and conduct a search operation, I will never spend my money here or support a business that supports them especially since they‚Äôre located in a community where the majority of people are immigrants/minorities that ICE is targeting.

Nice location very clean simple design ! Our server was really nice kept checking up on us asking if need anything or refills. Its in a really good location kinda low key the block they put it on. Definately will be back. My son ate for free because it was after 3pm! Sweet !

i went to this location and the atmosphere was so welcoming! the hostess, Tessa, was absolutely amazing and whenever i needed something she was very accommodating! she has a great personality and is amazing at what she does!

i tried twice...first day i had the spicy omelette and the steak was over salted...it just took away from what delicious flavor the pepers and eggs etc would give..second day i had the biscuit and gravy...the gravy was watered down and runny no flavor..i didnt even use it ..they placed it in a small container very small amount. they most likely need better cooks this would draw in more customers..place is clean and staff seem friendly..
Bad place. I didn't ask for ICE in my coffee but got it anyway. I wouldnt go here if it was the last place open.

I had the pleasure of receiving Tessa as a hostess and she made sure that my experience was amazing. She was extremely friendly and helpful. Her bubbly personality and outgoing demeanor was extremely infectious. My experience with her as a hostess was a 10/10.
alot to live up to at this location. was there last night they have an amazing staff already love the ambiance of the restaurant. melani and chris were wonderful
